This session focused on passing several bills related to professional licensing requirements, including changes to the process for obtaining a professional engineering license. There was some debate around the potential impacts of these changes, but overall the bills appear to have broad support.

**SB 125**: Amends requirements for obtaining a professional engineering license, decoupling the order of internship hours and the PE exam. Passed with House Bill 34 and 187 added.
**SB 244**: No further details provided.

## Bills Introduced (First Reading)
No new bills were introduced.

- There was discussion around the vetting process for the bills by the House Professional Licensing Subcommittee.
- Some concern was raised by Rep. Gabe McCoy about the potential for unqualified engineers designing infrastructure.

## Votes
No recorded votes were mentioned in the transcript.

## Attendance

## Adjournment
No adjournment time or next session date was provided.
